title: Voidborn
description: Voidborn is a fast-paced roguelite FPS set in a crumbling dark fantasy world where the player takes on the role of a Voidborn â€“ a powerful being created for one purpose; kill. Dash, slide, and wall-run through ancient underground cities, lava filled caves, blood soaked ruins, dark castles, and massive tombs. Slay demons to receive themed powerups to your different weapons and follow their upgrade paths to create devastating builds.
